page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT ASHBY MAGNA
page.content:
Employment in the area is restricted to farming and small cottage industries, thus the majority of the population is employed outside the area, mainly in Leicester and Rugby conurbations. Occupations range through textiles, engineering, hosiery, shopkeepers and assistants to a number of the professions such as medicine, engineering and computing.
Unemployment is not a severe problem there being only about 6 in this category in Ashby Magna.
Lack of transport presents a problem and all persons in employment have to use private transport to get to and from their workplace.
